name: Slime Knights
description:
Slime Knights Can you resist the endless waves of demons?

Take part in the fight alongside three slime knights!

And get the highest score possible!

Very simple mechanics:

  •  one click: forward
  • one click: back
  • a safe zone is on the far left to recover HP 3 times faster

Design: Kittennation
Music: Kittennation
Development: Kittennation

Have fun !
I will post all of the resources on OGA as soon as possible
